function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate data sharing and reporting in medical research","Impact":"Slower responsiveness to pandemics and medical research, hindering effective decision-making","Mitigation":"Implement regular audits, enforce data sharing, and set clear timeframes for data transfer","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, audit tools, data management systems","People":"Research communities, trial sponsors, health organizations","Owner":"Research communities, trial sponsors, health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of standardized and accessible data formats","Impact":"Difficulty in sharing and disseminating health system metrics, hindering effective decision-making and collaboration","Mitigation":"Develop standardized and accessible data formats, provide resources for data sharing, incentivize research groups","Technologies":"Standardized data formats, data sharing platforms, funding mechanisms","People":"Research communities, health organizations, media outlets","Owner":"Research communities, health organizations, media outlets"},{"Description":"High variability and lack of monitoring in guidance for data sharing","Impact":"Inconsistent data sharing practices, hindering effective decision-making and response to health emergencies","Mitigation":"Implement active encouragement, funding opportunities, and resources for data sharing, develop clear guidance and monitoring mechanisms","Technologies":"Guidance frameworks, monitoring tools, funding mechanisms","People":"Research communities, health organizations","Owner":"Research communities, health organizations"}]}
